summary.span: 將 物件來回轉換成其他型別。

span.span: Converts an object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會在 的執行個體和 之間來回轉換。The class only converts an instance of to and from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會在 的執行個體和 之間來回轉換。The class only converts an instance of to and from a . 此外，此命令必須是現有的命令，或必須指派給公用靜態屬性或公用靜態欄位。Also, the command must be an existing command, or must be assigned to a public static property or public static field.
